categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: The Skirmish at Kriselist was one of the first engagements of the New Republic after the Battle of Endor.

Admiral Firmus Nantz was given command of the New Republic First Fleet, tasked with operations in the galaxy's Western Reaches. He staged his campaign from the planet Saijo after the end of the Nagai–Tof War.

During the skirmish, the New Republic deployed SpecForces in one of the shattered urban centers of Kriselist to find Utoxx Prentioch's hidden palace. The New Republic overcame Prentioch's army, consisting of little more than thugs and cutthroats, and freed Kriselist from his tyrannical and brutal rule.
After his victory against Moff Prentioch's forces at Kriselist, Nantz then bypassed the rest of Prentioch's territory to engage Delvardus's forces at Moorja.
